info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 8:09AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WET SNOW THIS MORNING IN HIGHER ELEVATIONS... A several hour period of light to occasionally moderate wet snow will fall across the Taconics, Berkshires and Litchfield Hills through much of this morning. The snow will mainly accumulate on grassy surfaces, although a coating will be possible on some untreated roads at elevations above 1000 feet. A total of 1 to 3 inches of accumulation is expected, with mainly a mix of rain and snow or just plain rain in lower elevations below 1000 feet. Since this is the first snow of the year in these areas, drivers should exercise caution and be on the lookout for possible slippery road conditions.
